chrLockRangeMaxRadius_forD.Wiki: Lockable range of characters in dark places

chrLockRangeMaxRadius_forPD.AltName: Character Lock Range - Max Radius (Total Darkness)
chrLockRangeMaxRadius_forPD.Wiki: Character lockable range in total darkness

closeMaxHeight.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment height upper limit when non-lock-on is close

closeMinHeight.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment height lower limit when not locked on Proximity

closeAngRange.AltName: Attack Capture - Auto Acquisition - Angle Range Left
closeAngRange.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment when non-lock-on Left / right angle [deg] Proximity

closeMaxRadius.AltName: Attack Capture - Auto Acquisition - Max Radius
closeMaxRadius.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment distance when non-lock-on is close

closeMaxRadius_forD.AltName: Attack Capture - Auto Acquisition - Max Radius (Darkness)
closeMaxRadius_forD.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment distance at non-lock-on _ darkness proximity

closeMaxRadius_forPD.AltName: Attack Capture - Auto Acquisition - Max Radius (Total Darkness)
closeMaxRadius_forPD.Wiki: Automatic lock-on when non-lock-on _ pitch black proximity

bulletMaxRadius.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment distance when non-lock-on bullet

bulletMaxRadius_forD.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment distance at non-lock-on _ darkness bullet

bulletMaxRadius_forPD.AltName: Attack Capture - Bullet - Max Radius (Pitch Dark
bulletMaxRadius_forPD.Wiki: Automatic lock-on judgment distance at non-lock-on _ pitch black bullet

bulletAngRange.AltName: Attack Capture - Bullet - Angle Range Left/Right
bulletAngRange.Wiki: Automatic lock-on left / right angle when non-lock-on bullet

lockTgtKeepTime.Wiki: Time to continue locking even if the lock condition is not met (disabled at 0.0)

chrTransChaseRateForNormal.AltName: Transition Chase Factor for Normal Character
chrTransChaseRateForNormal.Wiki: Normal character translation tracking rate (disabled at -1.0)

horizontalTurnLimit_Left.Wiki: The limit in degrees at which the camera will no longer turn on the left-hand side.

horizontalTurnLimit_Right.Wiki: The limit in degrees at which the camera will no longer turn on the right-hand side.

chrRenderDist.Wiki: Distance between camera and characters before making the character invisible.

ascentCamUpDistMax.Wiki: Affects how far the camera can move up/down of character as they ascend.\nPositive values are up, negative values are down.

ascentCamTrailAmount.Wiki: Affects how much camera trails behind character as they ascend.
